summary: The implementation successfully addresses all core requirements for batch product upload in ProductManagementPage. A new BatchProductUpload component was created with file selection, validation, editable fields with preset defaults, batch creation logic using createProduct, and comprehensive toast notifications. The ProductManagementPage was modified to integrate the batch upload dialog. All 5 requirements (REQ-70 through REQ-74) appear to be implemented based on the available diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Progress bar with current/total count tracking during batch product creation
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies 'Progress feedback is displayed during the batch creation process' but does not explicitly require a progress bar or numerical progress tracking. The implementation added a Progress component and currentProgress state tracking.

hallucinated_features.description: Individual product removal capability from batch upload queue
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes handleRemoveProduct function allowing users to remove individual products from the pending list before creation. This functionality was not requested in any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Upload progress tracking for image uploads (withUploadProgress)
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation includes upload progress tracking via ExternalBlob.withUploadProgress callback. This granular upload progress was not specified in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Pre-submission validation for all products before batch creation starts
hallucinated_features.reason: The implementation validates all products (name, description, price > 0) before beginning batch creation. The requirements only specify format/size validation during file selection and error handling after submission.
